tasks.name: Project kickoff meeting
tasks.note: Gather all stakeholders to discuss project scope, timeline, and deliverables. Prepare agenda: goals, tech stack, roles & responsibilities.

tasks.name: Define API specifications
tasks.note: Document all REST API endpoints with request/response schemas. Use OpenAPI 3.0 format. Include authentication flow and error codes.

tasks.name: Design database schema
tasks.note: Create ER diagram for core entities: users, tasks, projects. Define indexes, foreign keys, and constraints. Consider normalization and query performance.

tasks.name: Create UI/UX mockups
tasks.note: Design wireframes for main pages: dashboard, task list, task details. Use Figma. Focus on mobile-first responsive design.

tasks.name: Setup development environment
tasks.note: Configure Docker containers for local dev. Setup PostgreSQL, Redis. Create docker-compose.yml with hot-reload support.

tasks.name: Implement user authentication
tasks.note: Implement JWT-based auth with refresh tokens. Add password hashing (bcrypt). Include email verification and password reset flows.

tasks.name: Create REST API endpoints
tasks.note: Build CRUD endpoints for tasks, projects, users. Implement filtering, sorting, pagination. Add input validation and error handling.

tasks.name: Setup React project structure
tasks.note: Initialize Vite + React + TypeScript project. Setup ESLint, Prettier. Configure routing (React Router), state management (Zustand), and API client (Axios).

tasks.name: Implement login/signup pages
tasks.note: Create forms with validation (react-hook-form + zod). Handle JWT storage. Add social login buttons (Google, GitHub). Show error messages.

tasks.name: Build dashboard components
tasks.note: Create reusable components: TaskCard, TaskList, ProjectCard, StatisticsWidget. Implement drag-and-drop for task ordering. Add real-time updates via WebSocket.

tasks.name: Add responsive design
tasks.note: Apply Tailwind CSS breakpoints for mobile/tablet/desktop. Test on different screen sizes. Ensure touch-friendly UI on mobile devices.

tasks.name: Write unit tests
tasks.note: Write Jest tests for backend services and API routes. Aim for 80% code coverage. Mock database and external services. Test edge cases and error handling.

tasks.name: Perform integration testing
tasks.note: Test end-to-end user flows with Playwright. Cover auth, CRUD operations, real-time updates. Test on Chrome, Firefox, Safari.

tasks.name: Setup CI/CD pipeline
tasks.note: Configure GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment. Run tests on PR. Auto-deploy to staging on merge to main. Manual approval for prod.

tasks.name: Deploy to production
tasks.note: Deploy to AWS ECS with load balancer. Configure SSL certificates. Setup database backups. Monitor logs and metrics with CloudWatch.

tasks.name: Fix login page CSS issues
tasks.note: Login button is misaligned on mobile. Form labels are cut off on narrow screens. Fix z-index issues with password visibility toggle.

tasks.name: Optimize database queries
tasks.note: Add indexes on frequently queried columns (user_id, created_at). Implement connection pooling. Use EXPLAIN ANALYZE to identify slow queries. Consider adding Redis cache.

tasks.name: Update README.md
tasks.note: Add setup instructions, environment variables, and deployment guide. Include screenshots. Update API examples. Add troubleshooting section.

tasks.name: Plan version 2.0 features
tasks.note: Gather user feedback from v1.0. Prioritize features: advanced filters, custom views, team collaboration, mobile app. Create product roadmap.

tasks.name: Research new technology stack
tasks.note: Evaluate alternatives: Remix vs Next.js 14, tRPC vs GraphQL, Prisma vs Drizzle ORM. Consider serverless architecture. Create comparison matrix.

tasks.name: Conduct security audit
tasks.note: Run OWASP ZAP scan. Review authentication flows. Check for SQL injection, XSS vulnerabilities. Test rate limiting. Perform penetration testing.

tasks.name: Setup monitoring and alerts
tasks.note: Configure Datadog/New Relic for APM. Setup alerts for error rates, response times, CPU/memory usage. Create dashboards for key metrics. Setup PagerDuty integration.

tasks.name: Weekend side project coding
tasks.note: Work on personal Rust project. Focus on implementing async runtime and improving error handling. Goal: Complete 2-3 modules.

tasks.name: Sunday family time
tasks.note: Quality time with family. Visit the park, have lunch together, play board games. No work-related activities.

tasks.name: Weekend on-call duty
tasks.note: On-call rotation for production systems. Monitor alerts, respond to incidents. Keep laptop and phone nearby. Escalate if needed.
